English:
By the way, I've got a job! It's in Kamishiro's
tech department!
Chinese:
喂喂你聽我說！　龍司他啊，找到工作了！
而且竟然是那個神代的技術部門！
Korean:
들어봐! 류지가 취직이 결정됐대!
무려 그 카미시로의 기술 부분이야!
German:
Ich habe jetzt einen Job! In der
Technikabteilung bei Kamishiro!

Chinese: 你有打電話給你老爸他們了嗎？

German: Ja, sie haben sich echt gefreut.

English:
I've put them through a lot. Now I can start
making it up to them.
Chinese:
至今為止給他們添了很多麻煩……
這下總算是能孝順他們了。
Korean:
지금까지 여러가지로 폐를 끼쳤으니까…
이걸로 겨우 보답할 수 있겠지
German:
Ich habe ihnen viel zugemutet. Jetzt kann ich
es wiedergutmachen.

English:
Their only child getting such a great job...
They must be proud!
Chinese:
獨子進入了一流企業，
你爸媽絕對很開心吧！
Korean:
외아들이 일류 기업에 취직한 거잖아.
아버지도 어머니도 당연히 기뻐하지!
German:
Ihr einziges Kind hat so einem tollen Job ...
Sie müssen echt stolz sein!

English:
Looks like we've got something to celebrate!
I feel like some steak, who's with me?!
Chinese:
好──今天要慶祝龍司找到工作！
大家一起去吃燒肉吧！
Korean:
좋아, 오늘은 류지의 취직 축하야!
다 같이 불고기 먹으러 가자!
German:
Da haben wir wohl was zu feiern!
Ich habe Lust auf Steak, wer ist dabei?!

Chinese: ……要不要去呢，如果隊長請客的話……

English: It's my celebration! You should be the one paying!
Chinese:
為什麼要幫我慶祝還我請客？
你給我出錢，全部。
Korean:
왜 축하받는 내가 사야되냐.
네가 내. 전액

English:
I'm still in high school. You think I've got that
kind of money?
Chinese: 太過分了，你別威脅一個高中生啦。
German:
Ich bin noch in der Schule. Meinst du, ich habe
so viel Geld?

English: How about you? In the mood for a free steak on me?
Chinese: 對吧？　你也想用傳說的錢吃肉對吧？
Korean: 그렇지? 너도 레전드의 돈으로 고기 먹고 싶지?
German:
Was ist mit dir? Soll ich dich auf ein Steak
einladen?

English: Hey, what are you doing? Come on!
Chinese: 喂～～你在做什麼？　要把你丟下來囉──！
German: He, was machst du denn? Komm schon!
